query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM trails) as trails_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cadastur_registry) as guides_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM blog_posts) as posts_count;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user Jj8Ug2TBV7Pg37C.root --database cCoaev8yfaEJXZAkd8a56J --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM trails) as trails_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cadastur_registry) as guides_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM blog_posts) as posts_count;
